pagelistblock.name: Page List
pagelistblock.description: Displays a list of pages, for example to display recent news

teaserblock.name: Teaser
teaserblock.description: Used to insert a content teaser

formblock.name: Form
formblock.description: Used to insert a form on a page

sitelogotypeblock.name: Logotype
sitelogotypeblock.description: Used to set the logotype for the website

videoblock.name: Video Player
videoblock.description: Used to embed a video player

editorialblock.name: Editorial
editorialblock.description: Used to add simple editorial content

buttonblock.name: Button
buttonblock.description: Used to add a button with a link

jumbotronblock.name: Jumbotron
jumbotronblock.description: Used to add a large section

articlepage.name: Article
articlepage.description: Used to publish news articles on the website

contactpage.name: Contact
contactpage.description: Used to publish contact details for a specific contact

containerpage.name: Container Page
containerpage.description: Used to logically group pages in the content tree

landingpage.name: Landing Page
landingpage.description: Used to create a page consisting entirely of blocks

newspage.name: News Page
newspage.description: Used as a start page for a site's news section and commonly displays a list of the most recent articles

productpage.name: Product
productpage.description: Used to present a specific product

searchpage.name: Search Page
searchpage.description: Used to provide on-site search features

startpage.name: Start Page
startpage.description: The home page of the website

standardpage.name: Standard Page
standardpage.description: Used mainly for default editorial content such as text and images

imagefile.name: Image
imagefile.description: Used for image files (BMP, GIF, ICO, JPEG, PNG)

videofile.name: Video
videofile.description: Used for video files (FLV, MP4, WEBM)

genericmedia.name: Generic File
genericmedia.description: Used for media which doesn't have a specific content type
